## Comment\_2.dispose() method

Dispose of this comment.

If you want to receive a comment "delete" event (newValue: null), then this should not be called directly. Instead call block.setCommentText(null);

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dispose(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
